description.value:
Wondrous item, common
This magic stone is warm to the touch. While carrying this stone, you are comfortable in and can tolerate temperatures as low as –20 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. If you wear heavy clothes, you can tolerate temperatures as low as –50 degrees Fahrenheit.
